title: Breaking Ground and Breaking Stereotypes: Nadia, the Woman Behind Jakarta's MRT Design
description: Nadia stood out the moment she walked onto the construction site â€” not because of her skills, but because she was the only woman present. Her journey in civil engineering redefined expectations.
name: Nadia

title: Mechanical Engineering with Purpose: Yuliana's Rise in a Male-Dominated Industry
description: Yuliana entered her mechanical engineering class and found only 3 other women among 100 students. "At first, I felt like I didn't belong," she said. But she persevered and now leads major projects.
name: Yuliana

title: From Stargazing in Yogyakarta to NASA: Raisa's Journey to the Stars
description: Raisa was fascinated by the stars ever since her father pointed out Orion's Belt from their rooftop in Yogyakarta. Despite limited science resources growing up, she now works at NASA.
name: Raisa
